name: The Dying Pearl
description:
Your a dying pearl, and once you shrink too much you will die. Collect Stars to gain extra time, and unlock new levels.

Good luck!

This game was created in Unity for the Tutorial Jam created by Vector Hat, following the 3D Roll-a-ball tutorial. This is my first ever game and game jam.

All feedback is greatly appreciated and welcome. This game is in active development and will receive updates.
